items.description: Nourishing & Tasty Breakfast Cereal Say Hello to a delightful breakfast, filled with multigrain goodness that will jump-start your mornings and get you ready for the day. It has the goodness of multigrain and 21% fruit, nut & seeds making for a nourishing and a tasty meal. Made of Five Nutritious Grains & delicious inclusions New Kellogg Muesli with 21% Fruit, Nut & Seeds comes with the goodness of five baked grains
items.title: Muesli, Pack of 2

items.description: Oreo: milk's best friend for over 100 years! Cadbury Oreo Vanilla creme sandwich biscuit consists of two chocolatey biscuits with a rich vanilla creme filling between them. Cadbury Oreo creme biscuits are made with cocoa, which defines their unique chocolatey flavour. Add this crunchy delight to your snacks and gift yourself rich and smooth joy. Oreo biscuits are perfect for snacking or enjoying as a treat at any time of the day. Twist, lick and dunk! Enjoy Oreo sandwich cookies with a glass of milk or add them to your favourite recipes such as cakes and milkshakes! Add a scoop of vanilla ice cream to Oreo biscuits to make your creamy dessert! Available in single & family/combo packs. This biscuit pack is suitable for vegetarians.
items.title: Oreo Biscuit, Buy 1 Get 1

iPhone 9
items.description: The iPhone 9 combines powerful performance with a sleek design, featuring a 4.7-inch Retina display, the A13 Bionic chip for smooth, fast multitasking, and a 12MP rear camera for stunning photos. Its lightweight, compact build includes improved battery life and enhanced security with Touch ID. A perfect choice for users seeking performance and value, the iPhone 9 offers seamless Apple experience in a more affordable package.

items.title: iPhone X
items.description: The iPhone X revolutionizes the smartphone experience with its stunning 5.8-inch Super Retina OLED display, Face ID for secure and easy unlocking, and the powerful A11 Bionic chip for smooth performance. Equipped with a dual 12MP rear camera system and advanced photo features, it captures brilliant images in any light. With wireless charging and a sleek, all-glass design, the iPhone X offers a premium, cutting-edge Apple experience.

items.title: Samsung Galaxy 9
items.description: The Samsung Galaxy S9 delivers a vibrant 5.8-inch Quad HD+ Super AMOLED display, powered by an advanced Snapdragon 845 processor for smooth performance and multitasking. With its 12MP Dual Aperture rear camera, it adapts to different lighting conditions for stunning photos, even in low light. Featuring IP68 water and dust resistance, stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos, and expandable storage, the Galaxy S9 combines powerful functionality with elegant design for an immersive and versatile smartphone experience.

items.title: OPPOF19
items.description: OPPO F19 offers a sleek and lightweight design with a 6.43-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display, delivering vivid visuals and a smooth touch experience. Powered by a Snapdragon 662 processor and equipped with 6GB RAM, it ensures seamless performance for daily tasks and entertainment. The 48MP AI triple camera captures sharp and vibrant photos, while the 5000mAh battery with 33W Flash Charge provides lasting power and quick recharges. Stylish and functional, the OPPO F19 is an ideal choice for users who want reliable performance and stunning visuals in a budget-friendly package.

items.title: Huawei P30
items.description: Huawei P30 combines elegance and innovation with its 6.1-inch OLED display and powerful Kirin 980 processor for smooth, efficient performance. Known for its impressive 40MP SuperSensing Leica triple camera system, the P30 captures stunning photos even in low light and ultra-wide shots with incredible detail. With a sleek design, in-screen fingerprint sensor, and long-lasting battery life, the Huawei P30 is a premium smartphone crafted for photography enthusiasts and users seeking top-notch performance.

items.title: MacBook Pro
items.description: MacBook Pro is a powerhouse laptop designed for professionals and creatives, featuring a stunning Retina display with True Tone for lifelike color accuracy. Powered by Apple's advanced M-series chip (or Intel, depending on the model), it delivers impressive speed, efficient multitasking, and extended battery life. With its high-performance graphics, spacious SSD storage, and Magic Keyboard, the MacBook Pro is ideal for intensive tasks like video editing, software development, and graphic design, offering exceptional performance in a sleek, portable design.

items.title: Samsung Galaxy Book
items.description: Samsung Galaxy Book is a versatile and lightweight laptop designed for productivity and entertainment, featuring a vibrant 15.6-inch Full HD display and powered by Intelâ€™s latest processors for smooth performance. With fast SSD storage, long-lasting battery life, and integrated Galaxy ecosystem connectivity, it provides seamless multitasking and collaboration with other Galaxy devices. Equipped with Dolby Atmos sound and a sleek, portable design, the Galaxy Book is an ideal choice for students and professionals who need power and mobility on the go.

items.title: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4
items.description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 combines elegant design with powerful performance, featuring a stunning 13.5-inch or 15-inch PixelSense touchscreen display with razor-sharp resolution and vibrant colors. Powered by the latest Intel or AMD Ryzen processors, it offers fast, efficient multitasking with extended battery life. With its comfortable keyboard, precision trackpad, and lightweight, portable build, the Surface Laptop 4 is perfect for professionals, students, and creatives alike, providing a premium Windows experience for work and entertainment.

items.title: Infinix INBOOK
items.description: Infinix INBook is a stylish and affordable laptop designed for everyday productivity and entertainment. Featuring a sleek 14-inch Full HD display, it delivers vibrant visuals and clear detail. Powered by the latest Intel processors and equipped with up to 16GB of RAM and ample SSD storage, the INBook ensures smooth multitasking and fast performance. With a lightweight design, long-lasting battery life, and multiple connectivity options, the Infinix INBook is perfect for students and professionals seeking a reliable and efficient laptop without breaking the bank.

items.title: HP Pavilion 15-DK1056WM
items.description: HP Pavilion 15-DK1056WM is a powerful laptop designed for both work and play. Featuring a 15.6-inch Full HD display, it delivers crisp visuals and vibrant colors for an immersive viewing experience. Powered by the latest Intel processors and NVIDIA GeForce GTX graphics, this laptop offers smooth performance for gaming and demanding applications. With a spacious keyboard, ample storage options, and long battery life, the Pavilion 15-DK1056WM is perfect for students and professionals who need reliability and versatility in a stylish package.

items.title: Perfume Oil
items.description: Perfume oil is a concentrated fragrance product that offers a long-lasting scent without the alcohol found in traditional perfumes. Typically made from a blend of essential oils, aromatic compounds, and carrier oils, perfume oils provide a rich and deep fragrance experience. They can be applied directly to the skin, allowing the scent to develop uniquely with each person's body chemistry. Available in various scents, from floral to woody, perfume oils are ideal for those seeking a more intense and personalized fragrance option, making them a popular choice for both personal use and gifting.

items.title: Brown Perfume
items.description: Brown perfume typically refers to fragrances that feature warm, rich, and earthy notes, evoking a sense of comfort and sophistication. These scents often incorporate ingredients like sandalwood, amber, vanilla, and various spices, creating a deep and inviting aroma. Brown perfumes can range from sweet and gourmand to woody and musky, making them suitable for both casual and formal occasions. Their warm character often makes them particularly appealing in colder months, providing a cozy and luxurious fragrance experience that lingers beautifully on the skin.

items.title: Fog Scent Xpressio Perfume
items.description: Fog Scent Xpressio Perfume is a captivating fragrance designed for those who appreciate bold and distinctive scents. This perfume blends vibrant notes that create an alluring aroma, perfect for daily wear or special occasions. With a combination of fresh, floral, and woody undertones, it offers a refreshing yet sophisticated experience that lingers throughout the day. The stylish packaging makes it an excellent choice for gifting, while the long-lasting formula ensures you stay fragrant and confident from morning to night. Experience the essence of elegance and charm with Fog Scent Xpressio Perfume.

items.title: Non-Alcoholic Concentrated Perfume Oil
items.description: Non-alcoholic concentrated perfume oil is a luxurious fragrance option crafted without alcohol, making it suitable for those with sensitive skin or those who prefer a more natural scent experience. These perfume oils are made from a blend of high-quality essential oils and aromatic compounds, resulting in rich and long-lasting fragrances. The concentrated nature of the oil means a little goes a long way, providing a more intense scent that evolves beautifully throughout the day. Ideal for personal use or gifting, non-alcoholic concentrated perfume oils offer a wide range of scents, from floral and fruity to musky and woody, allowing for a personalized fragrance experience without the drying effects of alcohol.
